core.do_not_close: Please do not close your browser tab

error.auth_sync: There was an unexpected issue while syncing the status of your authentication. Try to refresh your browser.
error.sign_in: The sign-in process was aborted or did not succeed.
error.proposal_not_found: An error occurred while loading the proposal.
error.proposal_payload: An error occurred while loading proposal payload.
error.proposal_payload_not_found: Payload for proposal: $proposal_id was not found.
error.neuron_spawning: Neuron is spawning, the details are not accessible until it has spawned.
error.neuron_load: An error occurred while loading the neuron.
error.sns_neurons_load: An error occurred while loading the neurons.
error.accounts_load: An error occurred while loading the accounts.
error.sns_accounts_balance_load: An error occurred while loading the balance of the accounts.
error.icrc_token_load: An error occurred while loading the token balance or metadata.
error.list_proposals: There was an unexpected issue while searching for the proposals.
error.list_proposals_payload_too_large: The current proposals response is too large. Please adjust proposal filters to get less results.
error.get_proposal: There was an unexpected issue while fetching proposal $proposalId.
error.wrong_proposal_id: The id "$proposalId" is not a valid proposal id.
error.list_canisters: There was an unexpected issue while searching for the canisters.
error.missing_identity: The operation cannot be executed without any identity.
error.rename_subaccount: An error occurred while renaming your linked account.
error.rename_subaccount_type: The account provided is not a linked account. Only linked account can be renamed.
error.get_neurons: There was an unexpected issue while searching for the neurons.
error.get_known_neurons: There was an unexpected issue while searching for the known neurons.
error.register_vote: Sorry, there was an error while registering the vote for the proposal $proposalType ($proposalId). Please try again.
error.register_vote_unknown: Sorry, there was an unexpected error while registering the vote. Please try again later.
error.followee_does_not_exist: Sorry, this neuron is not followed in that topic, refresh the page to have the latest data.
error.accounts_not_found: An error occurred while loading the accounts information.
error.query_balance: An error occurred while loading the balance for $accountId.
error.accounts_not_found_poll: An error occurred while loading the accounts information. The Internet Computer seems to be under high load, please try in a few minutes.
error.account_not_found: Sorry, the account "$account_identifier" was not found
error.account_not_reload: Sorry, the account "$account_identifier" cannot be reloaded
error.canister_not_found: Sorry, the canister "$canister_id" was not found
error.dummy_proposal: There was an error creating the proposals. Check the console for more details.
error.unlock_neuron: There was an error unlocking the neuron. Check the console for more details.
error.add_maturity: There was an error adding maturity. Check the console for more details.
error.update_neuron: There was an error updating the neuron. Check the console for more details.
error.unknown: Sorry, there was an unexpected error. Please try again later.
error.amount_not_valid: Sorry, the amount is not valid
error.amount_not_enough_stake_neuron: Sorry, the amount is too small. You need to stake a minimum of 1 ICP.
error.amount_not_enough_top_up_neuron: Sorry, the amount is too small. The amount plus the current stake need to be at least 1 ICP
error.transaction_error: Sorry, there was an error trying to execute the transaction.
error.transaction_too_old: Transaction is too old, could not be completed. Make sure your computer’s clock is set correctly, and try again.
error.transaction_created_in_future: Transaction was created in the future, could not be completed. Make sure your computer’s clock is set correctly, and try again.
error.unexpected_number_neurons_merge: Sorry, the number of neurons to merge should be only 2. Please try selecting again.
error.cannot_merge: Those two neurons cannot be merged.
error.not_authorized_neuron_action: Sorry, none of your principals is the controller of the neuron.
error.invalid_sender: Sorry, you can't send funds from this account.
error.insufficient_funds: Sorry, there are not enough funds in this account.
error.transfer_error: Sorry, there was an error with the transaction. Please try again later.
error.merge_neurons_same_id: Two neurons with the same id can't be merged.
error.merge_neurons_not_same_controller: Two neurons need to have the same controller.
error.merge_neurons_not_same_manage_neuron_fol: Two neurons need to have the same followee on the topic of "Manage Neuron".
error.merge_neurons_different_types: Only neurons of the same type can be merged.
error.neuron_account_not_found: Sorry, the neuron has no account associated.
error.governance_error: Sorry, there was an error. Please try again.
error.invalid_account_id: Sorry, the account id is not valid. Please try again with a valid account id.
error.address_not_icp_icrc_valid: The address is invalid. Please try again with a valid address identifier.
error.invalid_percentage: Sorry, the percentage amount is not valid.
error.input_length: Input must be longer than $length characters.
error.not_canister_controller: You are not the controller of this canister. Only controllers have access to its cycles and controllers.
error.canister_details_not_found: Sorry, there was an error loading the details of the canister. Please try again later.
error.controller_not_present: Principal is already not a controller.
error.pub_key_hex_string_invalid_length: The key must be >= 130 characters and <= 150 characters.
error.high_load_retrying: The Internet Computer is experiencing high load. We'll keep retrying.
error.canister_refund: Sorry, the operation was not successful and the amount has been refunded.
error.canister_creation_unknown: Sorry, there was an error creating the canister.
error.canister_top_up_unknown: Sorry, there was an error adding cycles to the canister.
error.canister_update_settings: Sorry, there was an error updating the canister settings.
error.not_canister_controller_to_update: The current user is not the controller of the canister. Only controllers can change the settings.
error.limit_exceeded_topping_up_canister: Error topping up canister. ICP might have been transferred, refresh the page. Try again if not.
error.limit_exceeded_creating_canister: Error creating canister. Canister might be created, refresh the page. Try again if not.
error.limit_exceeded_getting_open_ticket: There was an error connecting to the SNS swap. Please refresh the page.
error.transaction_fee_not_found: Sorry, there was an error loading the transaction fee.
error.token_not_found: Sorry, there was an error loading the token metadata information.
error.fetch_transactions: Sorry, there was an error loading the transactions for this account.
error.transaction_data: Sorry, there was an error with the transaction $txId.
error.amount_not_enough_stake_sns_neuron: Sorry, the amount is too small. You need to stake a minimum of $amount $token.
error.adding_permissions: There was an error adding permissions.
error.canister_invalid_transaction: Sorry, there was a problem with the transaction.
error.qrcode_camera_error: An error occurred while initializing the camera to read the QR code.
error.qrcode_token_incompatible: The payment token you are attempting to use is not compatible with this transaction.
error.invalid_ledger_index_pair: The provided index canister ID does not match the associated ledger canister ID.
error.index_canister_validation: An error occurred while validating the index canister ID. It appears that $indexCanister might not be a valid index canister ID.
error.refresh_voting_power: An error occurred while confirming following.

warning.auth_sign_out: You have been logged out because your session has expired.
warning.test_env_note:
Use with caution! This is not stable software, and it is not securely updated by the Network Nervous System. However, it accesses your real wallets and neurons.

Functionality you see here can change at any time, and this dapp may not always be available.
warning.test_env_confirm: I understand and want to continue

header.menu: Open menu to access navigation options
header.account_menu: Open menu to access logout button
header.account_id_tooltip: You can send ICP both to your principal ID and account ID, however some exchanges or wallets may not support transactions using a principal ID.

reporting.neurons_description: Download a detailed CSV report of your NNS neuron portfolio, which includes the stake, maturity, and neuron account IDs for manual tracking and analysis.
reporting.transactions_description: Download a detailed CSV report of your ICP transaction history, including both regular ICP accounts and NNS neurons showing staking and minting transactions for manual tracking and analysis.
reporting.busy_screen: Generating report... This may take a moment
reporting.error_file_system_access: Unable to save file. Please check your permissions.
reporting.error_neurons: There was an error exporting the neurons. Please try again.
reporting.error_transactions: There was an error exporting the transactions. Please try again.

accounts.buy_icp_description: ICP is the native utility token of the Internet Computer Protocol. You can lock ICP into neurons to participate in the governance of the Internet Computer, swap it in SNS decentralization swaps or convert it into 'cycles' that are used to pay for resources of canister smart contracts.
accounts.buy_icp_note: Disclaimer: Clicking the button below will take you to a third party website to complete your ICP transaction at your own risk.
accounts.new_linked_subtitle: Create a new account controlled by your Internet Identity
accounts.attach_hardware_subtitle: Create a new account controlled by your Ledger device
accounts.attach_hardware_description: Create a new account controlled by your connected Ledger device.
accounts.attach_hardware_neurons_text: The following are neurons controlled by the Ledger device. You can optionally add the NNS Dapp as a hotkey to these neurons, which allows you to manage the neurons directly from the Neurons tab.
accounts.connect_hardware_wallet_text: Connect your Ledger device to create a new account controlled by this Ledger device
accounts.show_info_hardware_wallet: Show Principal And Address On Device
accounts.hardware_wallet_add_hotkey_text_neuron: This action will add your NNS Dapp principal as a hotkey to neuron $neuronId.
accounts.hardware_wallet_add_hotkey_text_confirm: Are you sure you want to continue?
accounts.scan_qr_code_alt: Scan a QR code to fill destination address
accounts.token_price_error: ICPSwap API is currently unavailable, token prices cannot be fetched at the moment.
accounts.unpriced_tokens_warning: Value may be inaccurate as some prices could not be fetched.
accounts.token_price_source: Token prices are in ckUSDC based on data provided by ICPSwap.

staking.title: Stake and earn voting rewards
staking.text: Earn voting rewards by staking your tokens in neurons. Neurons allow you to participate in governance of the Internet Computer, and DAOs deployed on the Internet Computer.

neurons.title: Neurons
neurons.text: Earn voting rewards by staking your ICP in neurons. Neurons allow you to participate in governance on the Internet Computer by submitting and voting on Network Nervous System (NNS) proposals.
neurons.icp_will_be_locked: Your ICP will be locked for at least 7 days.
neurons.add_user_as_hotkey_message: This neuron is controlled by your Ledger device. To see and manage the neuron from the NNS dapp, please add your NNS dapp principal as hotkey to this neuron.
neurons.add_user_as_hotkey_success: Your principal was added to the neuron successfully.
neurons.remove_user_hotkey_confirm_text: Are you sure you want to remove your principal from the hotkeys of the neuron?
neurons.dissolve_delay_description: Dissolve delay is the minimum amount of time you have to wait for the neuron to unlock, and $token to be available again. Note, that dissolve delay only decreases when the neuron is in a dissolving state.
neurons.min_dissolve_delay_description: Voting power is given to neurons with a dissolve delay of at least 6 months.
neurons.dissolve_delay_below_minimum: The neuron will not have voting power unless the dissolve delay is increased.
neurons.dissolve_delay_below_current: The new dissolve delay must be greater than the current value
neurons.dissolve_delay_above_maximum: Dissolve delay exceeds the maximum allowed delay
neurons.cannot_merge_neuron_community: Neurons that joined the Neurons' Fund can't be merged.
neurons.cannot_merge_neuron_spawning: Neurons that are spawning can't be merged.
neurons.cannot_merge_neuron_hotkey: You cannot merge neurons controlled by a hotkey.
neurons.cannot_merge_neuron_state: Only locked neurons can be merged.
neurons.only_merge_two: You can only merge two neurons at a time.
neurons.need_two_to_merge: You need at least two neurons to merge
neurons.remove_followees_sale_prompt_error: There was an error removing the followee for topic Decentralization Swap.
neurons.remove_followees_sale_prompt_success: Followees for topic Decentralization Swap removed successfully.
neurons.merge_neurons_select_info: The order of selection matters. The neuron that you select first will be merged into the second one.
neurons.merge_neurons_more_info: Learn more about merging neurons here.
neurons.public_neuron_description: This neuron exposes additional information, including its votes.
neurons.private_neuron_description: This neuron limits information it exposes publicly.
neurons.make_neurons_public_banner_title: Neurons can now be private or public
neurons.make_neurons_public_banner_description: If you would like to make your neurons public, you can open one and change it under “Advanced Details & Settings”.
neurons.create_as_public_tooltip: Public neurons reveal more information about themselves including how they vote on proposals.
neurons.create_as_public_neuron_failure: Making your neuron public has failed, so it was created as a private neuron. You can change neuron visibility at any time under "Advanced Details & Settings"

losing_rewards.description: ICP neurons that are inactive for $period start missing voting rewards. To avoid missing rewards, vote manually, edit, or confirm your following.
losing_rewards.confirming: Confirming following. This may take a moment.
losing_rewards.badge_label: Confirm following to avoid missing rewards
losing_rewards.hw_hotkey_warning: You may have neurons that are not added to the NNS dapp. If you want to view your neurons and get alerts in case they start missing voting rewards, you can add them by clicking Show Neurons > Add to NNS Dapp.

losing_rewards_banner.confirm_title: Confirm following or vote manually to avoid missing rewards
losing_rewards_banner.days_left_title: $timeLeft left to confirm your neuron following
losing_rewards_banner.rewards_missing_title: One or more of your neurons are missing voting rewards

losing_rewards_modal.title: Review your following for neurons
losing_rewards_modal.label: Neurons
losing_rewards_modal.no_following: This neuron has no following configured. You need to vote manually to earn voting rewards.

new_followee.title: Enter New Followee
new_followee.label: Followee's Neuron Id
new_followee.followee_does_not_exist: Neuron with id $neuronId does not exist.
new_followee.neuron_not_followee: Sorry, you can't unfollow neuron $neuronId because you are not following it.
new_followee.already_followed: You are already following this neuron.

follow_neurons.description: Follow neurons to automate your voting, and receive the maximum voting rewards. You can follow neurons on specific topics or all topics.
follow_neurons.topic_0_title: All Except Governance, and SNS & Neurons' Fund
follow_neurons.topic_0_subtitle: Follow neurons on all proposal topics except the governance topic, and SNS & Neurons' Fund.
follow_neurons.topic_1_subtitle: Proposals that manage specific neurons, for example making them perform actions.
follow_neurons.topic_2_subtitle: All proposals that provide “real time” information about the value of ICP, as measured by an IMF SDR, which allows the NNS to convert ICP to cycles (which power computation) at a rate which keeps their real world cost constant.
follow_neurons.topic_3_subtitle: Proposals that administer network economics, for example, determining what rewards should be paid to node operators.
follow_neurons.topic_4_subtitle: All proposals that administer governance, for example to freeze malicious canisters that are harming the network.
follow_neurons.topic_5_subtitle: All proposals that administer node machines somehow, including, but not limited to, upgrading or configuring the OS, upgrading or configuring the virtual machine framework and upgrading or configuring the node replica software.
follow_neurons.topic_6_subtitle: All proposals that administer network participants, for example, granting and revoking DCIDs (data center identities) or NOIDs (node operator identities).
follow_neurons.topic_7_subtitle: All proposals that administer network subnets, for example creating new subnets, adding and removing subnet nodes, and splitting subnets.
follow_neurons.topic_8_subtitle: All proposals to manage NNS-controlled canisters not covered by other topics (Protocol Canister Management or Service Nervous System Management).
follow_neurons.topic_9_subtitle: Proposals that update KYC information for regulatory purposes, for example during the initial Genesis distribution of ICP in the form of neurons.
follow_neurons.topic_12_subtitle: Proposals handling updates of a subnet's replica version
follow_neurons.topic_13_subtitle: Proposals dealing with blessing and retirement of replica versions
follow_neurons.topic_14_subtitle: Proposals related to SNS and Neurons' Fund
follow_neurons.topic_15_subtitle: Proposals related to the management of API boundary nodes
follow_neurons.topic_16_subtitle: All proposals related to renting a subnet, for example a subnet rental request.
follow_neurons.topic_17_subtitle: All proposals to manage protocol canisters, which are considered part of the ICP protocol and are essential for its proper functioning.
follow_neurons.topic_18_subtitle: All proposals to manage the canisters of service nervous systems (SNS), including upgrading relevant canisters and managing SNS framework canister WASMs through SNS-W.

voting.nothing_found: No proposals found for the filters.
voting.nns_actionable_proposal_tooltip: You can still vote on $count NNS proposals.
voting.sns_actionable_proposal_tooltip: You can still vote on $count $snsName proposals.
voting.total_actionable_proposal_tooltip: You can still vote on $count proposals.
voting.is_actionable_status_badge_tooltip: You can still vote on this proposal.

actionable_proposals_sign_in.title: You are not signed in.
actionable_proposals_sign_in.text: Sign in to see actionable proposals

canisters.text: Developers can create and manage their canisters (a form of smart contracts) and cycles consumption here.
canisters.create_canister_success_id: New canister with id $canisterId created successfully
canisters.name: Canister Name
canisters.minimum_cycles_text_1: Minimum amount: 2T Cycles (inclusive of 0.1T Cycles fee if creating a new canister)
canisters.minimum_cycles_text_2: Transaction fee of $amount is charged to the source account.
canisters.transaction_fee: The Transaction fee of $amount is charged to the source account.

canister_detail.title: Canister
canister_detail.confirm_unlink_description_1: This will unlink the canister from your account, it does not change the controller.
canister_detail.confirm_unlink_description_2: If you control the canister, ensure you have its identifier stored securely.
canister_detail.confirm_remove_controller_description: Are you sure you want to remove the following controller?
canister_detail.confirm_remove_controller_user_descripti: Are you sure you want to remove the current user from the controllers?
You will lose access to the canister.
canister_detail.confirm_remove_last_controller_descripti: This is the last remaining controller. If you remove it, nobody will be able to control the canister.
canister_detail.canister_name_error_too_long: Canister name too long. Maximum of $max characters allowed.

wallet.title: Account
wallet.icp_qrcode_aria_label: A QR code that renders the address to receive ICP
wallet.icrc_qrcode_aria_label: A QR code that renders the address to receive $tokenSymbol

busy_screen.pending_approval_hw: Please use your Ledger device to approve.

proposal_detail.headline: Proposal Details
proposal_detail.title: Proposal
proposal_detail.proposer_description: The ID of the neuron that submitted the proposal.
proposal_detail.created_description: The date when this proposal was created.
proposal_detail.decided_description: The date when this proposal was adopted or rejected.
proposal_detail.executed_description: The date when this adopted proposal was executed.
proposal_detail.failed_description: The date when this adopted proposal failed to be executed.
proposal_detail.toggle_lable: Switch between user-friendly and raw data representation

proposal_detail__vote.confirm_adopt_text: You are about to cast $votingPower votes for this proposal, are you sure you want to proceed?
proposal_detail__vote.confirm_reject_text: You are about to cast $votingPower votes against this proposal, are you sure you want to proceed?
proposal_detail__vote.vote_status_registering: Neurons registered: $completed/$amount. Keep the dapp open until completed.
proposal_detail__vote.immediate_majority_description: A proposal is immediately adopted or rejected if, before the voting period ends, more than half of the total voting power votes Yes, or at least half votes No, respectively (indicated by $icon_immediate_majority).
proposal_detail__vote.immediate_super_majority_description: A critical proposal is immediately adopted or rejected if, before the voting period ends, more than $immediate_majority of the total voting power votes Yes, or at least $no_immediate_majority votes No, respectively (indicated by $icon_immediate_majority).
proposal_detail__vote.standard_majority_description: At the end of the voting period, a proposal is adopted if more than half of the votes cast are Yes votes, provided these votes represent at least $standard_majority of the total voting power (indicated by $icon_standard_majority). Otherwise, it is rejected. Before a proposal is decided, the voting period can be extended in order to “wait for quiet”. Such voting period extensions occur when a proposal’s voting results turn from either a Yes majority to a No majority or vice versa.
proposal_detail__vote.standard_super_majority_description: At the end of the voting period, a critical proposal is adopted if more than $immediate_majority of the votes cast are Yes votes, provided these votes represent at least $standard_majority of the total voting power (indicated by $icon_standard_majority). Otherwise, it is rejected. Before a proposal is decided, the voting period can be extended in order to “wait for quiet”. Such voting period extensions occur when a proposal’s voting results turn from either a Yes majority to a No majority or vice versa.
proposal_detail__vote.decision_intro: There are two ways a proposal can be decided:
proposal_detail__vote.super_majority_decision_intro: There are two ways a critical proposal can be decided:
proposal_detail__vote.no_nns_neurons: You don't have any neurons to vote
proposal_detail__vote.no_sns_neurons: You don't have any $project neurons to vote
proposal_detail__vote.no_nns_neurons_description: You have no neurons. Create a neuron by staking ICP to vote on proposals.

proposal_detail__ineligible.headline: $count Ineligible neuron
proposal_detail__ineligible.text: The following neurons are not eligible to vote. They either have dissolve delays of less than $minDissolveDelay at the time when the proposal was submitted, or they were created after the proposal was submitted.

neuron_detail.title: Neuron
neuron_detail.voting_power_section_description_expande: The dissolve delay must be at least $minDuration for the neuron to have voting power. Learn more about voting power on the dashboard.
The dissolve delay must be at least 6 months for the neuron to have voting power. Learn more about voting power on the dashboard.
neuron_detail.this_neuron_calculation: For this neuron, the calculation is:
neuron_detail.maturity_section_description: Earn rewards by voting on proposals and/or following active neurons.
neuron_detail.nns_staked_maturity_tooltip: Staked maturity contributes to the neuron’s voting power, but cannot be spawned into a new neuron.
neuron_detail.sns_staked_maturity_tooltip: Staked maturity contributes to the neuron’s voting power, but cannot be disbursed.
neuron_detail.join_community_fund_description_1: Are you sure you want this neuron to join the neurons' fund?
neuron_detail.join_community_fund_description_2: If you do, your neuron may use some of its maturity to participate in future SNS swaps, resulting in a basket of SNS neurons.
neuron_detail.join_community_fund_hw_alert_1: Note that the resulting SNS neurons will have the NNS governance canister as their controller. Since you are not the controller of these SNS neurons, you will not be able to manage or disburse them.
neuron_detail.join_community_fund_hw_alert_2: However, you will be able to vote on SNS proposals as your NNS neuron’s controller and up to three of its hotkeys will be set as hotkeys for the SNS neuron(s).
neuron_detail.leave_community_fund_description: Are you sure you want this neuron to leave the neurons' fund?
neuron_detail.auto_stake_maturity_on: Are you sure that you would like to automatically stake new maturity of this neuron?
neuron_detail.auto_stake_maturity_off: Are you sure that you would like to stop automatically staking new maturity of this neuron?
neuron_detail.maturity_last_distribution_info: On a day with no settled proposals, no rewards are distributed; rather rewards will roll over to the following day. The last distribution date is the last time rewards were distributed. Learn more
neuron_detail.disburse_maturity_description_1: Burn maturity to mint new $symbol tokens. In 7 days, new $symbol tokens will be minted and sent to the destination address.
neuron_detail.disburse_maturity_description_2: The quantity of new $symbol minted will depend on the maturity modulation function (see the wiki page). Consult with tax and legal advisors with further questions, and proceed at your own risk.
neuron_detail.disburse_maturity_amount: Choose how much of the maturity available to disburse:
neuron_detail.stake_maturity_disabled_tooltip: Currently, you do not have any maturity available to stake into this neuron.
neuron_detail.disburse_maturity_disabled_tooltip_zero: Currently, you do not have any maturity available to disburse.
neuron_detail.disburse_maturity_disabled_tooltip_non_z: You do not have enough maturity to disburse. The minimum is: $amount.
neuron_detail.start_dissolve_description:
This will cause your neuron to lose its age bonus.
Are you sure you wish to continue?
neuron_detail.stop_dissolve_description: Are you sure you want to stop the dissolve process?
neuron_detail.join_community_fund_success: Your neuron has successfully joined the neurons' fund.
neuron_detail.leave_community_fund_success: Your neuron has successfully left the neurons' fund.
neuron_detail.following_description: Following allows you to delegate your votes to another neuron holder. You still earn rewards if you delegate your voting rights. You can change your following at any time.
neuron_detail.merge_neurons_success: Your neurons have been successfully merged.
neuron_detail.split_neuron_success: Your neuron has successfully been split.
neuron_detail.split_neuron_disabled_tooltip: Neuron needs a minimum stake of $amount $token to be splittable.
neuron_detail.spawn_neuron_disabled_tooltip: You need at least the equivalent of $amount ICP ($min / $variability) to spawn a new neuron from maturity.
neuron_detail.no_notkeys_yet: To vote with this neuron from another dapp, add the principal id you have in the other dapp as a hotkey.
neuron_detail.invalid_hotkey: Hotkey not valid. Refresh the page and try again.
neuron_detail.disburse_maturity_confirmation_descripti: This action is irreversible. Take a screenshot or record this information somewhere you can reference it. Consult with tax and legal advisors with further questions, and proceed at your own risk.
neuron_detail.active_maturity_disbursements_descriptio: These disbursements are in progress and irreversible. After 7 days, new $symbol tokens will be minted and sent to the destination address. The quantity of new $symbol minted will depend on the maturity modulation function (see the wiki page).
neuron_detail.stake_maturity_modal_description: Choose how much of the maturity available to stake into this neuron.
neuron_detail.stake_maturity_confirmation: Are you sure you wish to stake $percentage of the maturity available?
neuron_detail.spawn_neuron_choose: Choose how much of the maturity available to spawn.
neuron_detail.spawn_neuron_explanation_1: Burn maturity to mint new ICP tokens. This will cause a new neuron to be spawned in your account. In one week, new ICP tokens will be minted and added to this neuron. At that time, it will be possible to disburse the new ICP tokens from inside the neuron into an account.
neuron_detail.spawn_neuron_explanation_2: The quantity of new ICP minted will depend on the ICP price trend at the time (see the wiki page). The newly minted ICP may be seen as income by tax authorities, since it is a kind of cryptocurrency, and you should plan accordingly. Always speak to a tax advisor.
neuron_detail.spawn_neuron_note_hw: Neurons controlled by Ledger devices can only spawn 100% of their maturity.
neuron_detail.nns_available_maturity_tooltip: Available maturity can be staked, or burned to spawn a neuron containing an amount of ICP that is subject to a non-deterministic process, called maturity modulation.
neuron_detail.sns_available_maturity_tooltip: Available maturity can be staked, or burned to disburse an amount of $token that is subject to a non-deterministic process, called maturity modulation.
neuron_detail.spawning_neuron_info: When this neuron has finished spawning, newly minted ICP will be added. The quantity of new ICP minted will depend on the ICP price trend. You will then be able to disburse this new ICP if you wish.
neuron_detail.reward_status_inactive_description: Confirm following or vote manually to continue receiving rewards
neuron_detail.reward_status_inactive_reset_description: Following has been reset. Confirm following or vote manually to continue receiving rewards
neuron_detail.neuron_state_tooltip: Your neuron can be locked, unlocked or dissolving. In a locked state, it is accruing age bonus, while its dissolve delay stays constant. If the neuron is in a dissolving state, its age bonus is set to 0, while dissolve delay decreases with time. After dissolve delay reaches 0, the neuron is unlocked, and $token held in it can be sent to any $token account.
neuron_detail.dissolve_delay_tooltip: Dissolve delay is the minimum amount of time you have to wait for the neuron to unlock, and $token to be available again. If your neuron is dissolving, your $token will be available in $duration.
neuron_detail.neuron_stake_refreshed: Your neuron's stake was refreshed successfully.
neuron_detail.change_neuron_make_neuron_public_confirm: Are you sure you want to make your neuron public?
neuron_detail.change_neuron_make_neuron_private_confir: Are you sure you want to make your neuron private?
neuron_detail.change_neuron_make_neuron_public_descrip: Making your neuron public will reveal certain information about it such as how it voted on past proposals.
neuron_detail.change_neuron_make_neuron_private_descri: Making your neuron private will hide certain information about it such as how it voted on past proposals.
neuron_detail.change_neuron_visibility_partial_failure: $failedCount out of $totalCount neurons have failed to update their visibility, please try again later. You can change neuron visibility at any time under "Advanced Details & Settings".
neuron_detail.change_neuron_visibility_failure: Your neurons have failed to update their visibility, please try again later. You can change neuron visibility at any time under "Advanced Details & Settings".
neuron_detail.uncontrollable_neurons_description: These neurons have different controllers and won't be updated
neuron_detail.public_visibility_action_hw_tooltip: Updating visibility of Ledger device controlled neurons is not supported at the moment

sns_launchpad.no_open_projects: Looks like there are no SNS decentralisation swaps running right now. Hopefully one is coming soon! Read more about how SNSs are created.
sns_launchpad.no_proposals: There are no decentralisation swap proposals open at the moment.

sns_project_detail.min_participation_reached: 🎉 Minimum participation has been reached, the swap is successful.
sns_project_detail.understand_agree: I understand that I cannot withdraw or edit my commitment after I select "Send Now," and that my commitment may be returned to my main ICP account if the swap is unsuccessful for any reason.
sns_project_detail.participate_success: Your participation has been successfully committed.
sns_project_detail.not_eligible_to_participate: You are not eligible to participate in this swap.
sns_project_detail.getting_sns_open_ticket: We're connecting with the SNS swap. This might take more than a minute.
sns_project_detail.current_nf_commitment_description: The Neurons' Fund commitment increases based on direct participation. The exact amount is computed at the end of the swap. Learn more.

sns_neuron_detail.vesting_period_tooltip: This function is not available during your vesting period. Vesting will last another $remainingVesting
sns_neuron_detail.add_hotkey_info: To vote with this neuron from another dapp, add the principal id you have in the other dapp as a hotkey.
sns_neuron_detail.add_hotkey_tooltip: To vote with this neuron from another dapp, add the principal id you have in the other dapp as a hotkey.

sns_neurons.text: You have no $project neurons. Create a neuron by staking $tokenSymbol to vote on $project proposals.
sns_neurons.min_dissolve_delay_description: Voting power is given to neurons with a dissolve delay of at least $duration.

error__ledger.unexpected: There was an error with the Ledger device.
error__ledger.app_version_not_supported: This Ledger device is running an outdated version of the Internet Computer app. In order to use the device with this application, it needs to be updated to version 2.4.9 or later. More info here.
error__ledger.please_open: Please open the Internet Computer app on your Ledger device and try again.
error__ledger.locked: Ledger device is locked. Unlock it and try again.
error__ledger.fetch_public_key: Unable to fetch the public key. Please try again.
error__ledger.principal_not_match: Principal returned by the device does not match the public key.
error__ledger.signature_unexpected: A ledger error happened during signature. $message (code $code).
error__ledger.connect_no_device: No Ledger device found. Is the Ledger device connected and unlocked?
error__ledger.connect_many_apps: Cannot connect to the Ledger device. Please close all other wallet applications (e.g. Ledger Live) and try again.
error__ledger.connect_not_supported: Either you have other wallet applications open (e.g. Ledger Live), or your browser doesn't support WebHID, which is necessary to communicate with your Ledger device. Supported browsers: Chrome (Desktop) v89+, Edge v89+, Opera v76+. Error: $err
error__ledger.unexpected_wallet: Found unexpected public key. Are you sure you're using the right Ledger device?
error__ledger.access_denied: Access denied to use the ledger device.
error__ledger.user_rejected_transaction: The transaction was rejected on the ledger device.
error__ledger.version_not_supported: Sorry, transaction not supported with version $currentVersion. Please upgrade the Internet Computer app on your Ledger device to at least version $minVersion.
error__ledger.browser_not_supported: Sorry, the browser does not support the WebHID API needed to connect the Ledger device. Check support in https://caniuse.com/?search=WebHID
error__ledger.incorrect_identifier: Wallet account identifier doesn't match. Are you sure you connected the right Ledger device? Expected identifier: $identifier. Wallet identifier: $ledgerIdentifier.

error__attach_wallet.unexpected: There was an error trying to attach the Ledger device.
error__attach_wallet.connect: You need to connect your Ledger device first.
error__attach_wallet.no_identity: No identity connected to your Ledger device.
error__attach_wallet.already_registered: The Ledger device is already registered with another account.
error__attach_wallet.limit_exceeded: The maximum number of Ledger devices that can be attached has been reached.
error__attach_wallet.create_hardware_wallet_too_long: The name $accountName is too long (max. 24 characters). Please, choose a shorter name.

error__account.subaccount_too_long: The name $subAccountName of the linked account is too long (max. 24 characters). Please, choose a shorter name.
error__account.create_subaccount_limit_exceeded: Sorry, you reached the limit of linked accounts in this account.
error__account.create_subaccount: Sorry, there was an unexpected error when creating your linked account, please try again.
error__account.subaccount_not_found: Error renaming subAccount, subAccount ($account_identifier) not found
error__account.rename_account_not_found: Error renaming subAccount, account ($account_identifier) not found
error__account.not_selected: An account should be selected. Please choose one.

error__canister.name_taken: The name $name is already in use. Names must be unique.
error__canister.name_too_long: The name $name is too long (max. 24 characters). Please, choose a shorter name.
error__canister.limit_exceeded: The limit of canisters that can be linked has been exceeded.
error__canister.get_exchange_rate: Error getting the exchange rate of ICP to Cycles.

error__imported_tokens.load_imported_tokens: There was an unexpected issue while loading imported tokens.
error__imported_tokens.add_imported_token: There was an unexpected issue while importing the token.
error__imported_tokens.remove_imported_token: There was an unexpected issue while removing the imported token.
error__imported_tokens.update_imported_token: There was an unexpected issue while updating the imported token.
error__imported_tokens.too_many: You can't import more than $limit tokens.
error__imported_tokens.ledger_canister_loading: Unable to load token details using the provided ledger canister ID.
error__imported_tokens.is_duplication: You have already imported this token, you can find it in the token list.
error__imported_tokens.is_sns: You cannot import SNS tokens, they are added by the NNS.
error__imported_tokens.is_important: This token is already in the token list.

error__sns.undefined_project: The requested project is invalid or throws an error.
error__sns.list_summaries: There was an unexpected error while loading the summaries of all deployed projects.
error__sns.load_swap_commitment: There was an unexpected error while loading the commitment of the project.
error__sns.load_sale_total_commitments: There was an unexpected error while loading the commitments of the project.
error__sns.load_sale_lifecycle: There was an unexpected error while loading the status of the project.
error__sns.sns_remove_hotkey: There was an error removing the hotkey.
error__sns.sns_split_neuron: There was an error while splitting the neuron.
error__sns.sns_disburse: There was an error while disbursing the neuron.
error__sns.sns_start_dissolving: There was an error while starting dissolving the neuron.
error__sns.sns_stop_dissolving: There was an error while stopping dissolving the neuron.
error__sns.sns_stake: There was an error while staking the neuron.
error__sns.sns_increase_stake: There was an error while increasing the stake of the neuron.
error__sns.sns_register_vote: There was an error while registering vote (Neuron: $neuronId).
error__sns.sns_dissolve_delay_action: There was an error while updating dissolve delay of the neuron.
error__sns.project_not_found: Sorry, the project was not found. Please refresh and try again
error__sns.project_not_open: Sorry, the project does not accept participations yet.
error__sns.not_enough_amount: Sorry, the amount is too small. You need a minimum of $amount ICP to participate in this swap.
error__sns.commitment_too_large: Sorry, your new commitment of $newCommitment ICP is too high. You have already committed $currentCommitment ICP and the maximum is $maxCommitment ICP.
error__sns.commitment_exceeds_current_allowed: Sorry, your commitment of $commitment ICP is too high. There is $remainingCommitment ICP left to reach maximum.
error__sns.sns_sale_unexpected_error: Sorry, There was an unexpected error while participating. Please refresh the page and try again.
error__sns.sns_sale_unexpected_and_refresh: Sorry, There was an unexpected error while participating. Please refresh and try again
error__sns.sns_sale_final_error: Sorry, there was an unexpected error connection with the SNS swap. Please reload the page and try again.
error__sns.sns_sale_proceed_with_existing_ticket: There is an existing participation started at $time. Completing that participation.
error__sns.sns_sale_closed: Sorry, the swap was already closed. Please reload the page.
error__sns.sns_sale_not_open: Sorry, the swap is not yet open. Please reload the page.
error__sns.sns_sale_invalid_amount: Can't participate with the selected amount. Please participate with a different amount ($min - $max).
error__sns.sns_sale_invalid_subaccount: Can't participate with the selected subaccount.
error__sns.sns_sale_try_later: Sorry, there was an unexpected error while participating. Please try again later.
error__sns.ledger_temporarily_unavailable: Sorry, the ledger is not available at the moment. Please try again later.
error__sns.ledger_duplicate: Sorry, the transaction is duplicated. Please try again.
error__sns.ledger_bad_fee: Sorry, wrong transaction fee applied. Please try again.
error__sns.ledger_created_future: Sorry, the transaction can't be created in the future. Please try again.
error__sns.ledger_too_old: Sorry, the transaction is too old. Please try again.
error__sns.ledger_insufficient_funds: Sorry, the account doesn't have enough funds for this transaction.
error__sns.sns_add_followee: There was an error while adding a followee.
error__sns.sns_remove_followee: There was an error while unfollowing the neuron.
error__sns.sns_add_hotkey: There was an error adding the hotkey.
error__sns.sns_stake_maturity: There was an error while staking the maturity of the neuron.
error__sns.sns_disburse_maturity: There was an error while disbursing the maturity of the neuron.
error__sns.sns_amount_not_enough_stake_neuron: Sorry, the amount is too small. You need a minimum of $minimum $token to stake.

auth_accounts.title: 100% on-chain governance
auth_accounts.text: Manage your ICP, ckBTC, and SNS governance tokens within the NNS wallet — hosted 100% on the Internet Computer blockchain. Transfer tokens, secure them with Ledger devices, or participate in governance to earn voting rewards.

auth_report.title: Reporting
auth_report.text: Download a detailed CSV report of your neuron portfolio, which includes your stake, maturity, and neuron account ID for manual tracking and analysis, along with your ICP transactions.

auth_canisters.title: Run your code on the Internet Computer
auth_canisters.text: Create and manage your canister smart contracts and top them up with cycles here. Anywhere, anytime.

sns_rewards_description.1: The proposal is still accepting votes, for the purpose of voting rewards.
sns_rewards_description.2: The proposal is no longer accepting votes. It is due to settle in the next reward event.
sns_rewards_description.3: The proposal has been taken into account in a reward event.

sns_status_description.1: A decision has not yet been made to adopt or reject the proposal.
sns_status_description.3: The proposal has been adopted. Either execution has not yet started, or it has started but the outcome is not yet known.
sns_status_description.4: The proposal was adopted and successfully executed.
sns_status_description.5: The proposal was adopted, but execution failed.

metrics.nns_high_load: NNS is under a high load.
metrics.thanks_fun: Thanks for being part of the fun!

ckbtc.title: ckBTC
ckbtc.qrcode_aria_label_bitcoin: A QR code that renders the address to receive Bitcoin
ckbtc.qrcode_aria_label_ckBTC: A QR code that renders the address to receive ckBTC
ckbtc.ckbtc_balance_updated: Updated available ckBTC : New confirmed BTC.
ckbtc.ckbtc_buzz_words: ckBTC is a multi-chain bitcoin twin on the Internet Computer created by canister smart contracts that directly hold native bitcoin.
ckbtc.incoming_bitcoin_network: Note: incoming Bitcoin transactions require $min confirmations. Check status on a
ckbtc.sign_in_for_address: Sign in to see your BTC deposit address.

error__ckbtc.already_process: The minter has already been notified and updating the balance is in progress.
error__ckbtc.info_not_found: Sorry, there was an error loading the ckBTC minter information.
error__ckbtc.get_btc_address: Sorry, the BTC address for the account cannot be fetched.
error__ckbtc.get_btc_no_universe: A ckBTC environment should be provided to execute this feature
error__ckbtc.update_balance: Sorry, the balance cannot be updated.
error__ckbtc.no_new_confirmed_btc: Updated available ckBTC : No new confirmed BTC.
error__ckbtc.retrieve_btc_unknown: Sorry, retrieving BTC failed for an unknown reason.
error__ckbtc.estimated_fee: Sorry, the Bitcoin estimated fee cannot be fetched.
error__ckbtc.retrieve_btc_min_amount: The amount falls below the minimum of $amount ckBTC required for converting to BTC.
error__ckbtc.retrieve_btc_min_amount_unknown: The minimum amount of ckBTC required for converting to BTC is unknown.
error__ckbtc.wait_ckbtc_info_parameters_certified: Please wait until the ckBTC parameters have been certified.

feature_flags_prompt.override_true: Enter the number for the feature you want to enable.
feature_flags_prompt.override_false: Enter the number for the feature you want to disabled.
feature_flags_prompt.remove_override: Enter the number for the feature you want to set back to its default value.

settings.your_principal_description: Your ID for the NNS Dapp. Created by your Internet Identity.
settings.your_session_description: All sessions last 30 minutes. After 30 minutes, you will need to authenticate again with Internet Identity.

sync.status_error: An error occurred while synchronizing data.
sync.status_error_detailed: An error occurred while synchronizing data. Please try reloading the page. If the problem persists, please contact support for further assistance.

tokens.hide_zero_balances_toggle_label: Switch between showing and hiding tokens with a balance of zero
tokens.add_imported_token_success: New token has been successfully imported!
tokens.remove_imported_token_success: The token has been successfully removed!
tokens.update_imported_token_success: The token has been successfully updated!

import_token.description: You can import a new token to your NNS dapp wallet by providing its ledger canister ID.
import_token.index_canister_description: To see this token's transaction history in the NNS dapp, you need to provide its index canister. Note: not all tokens have index canisters.
import_token.warning: Warning: Be careful what token you import! Anyone can create a token including one with the same name as existing tokens, such as ckBTC.
import_token.remove_confirmation_header: Are you sure you want to remove this token from your account?
import_token.remove_confirmation_description: Tokens you hold in your account will not be lost. You can import this token in the future again.
import_token.add_index_description: Transaction history is not available. To see this token’s transaction history in the NNS dapp, you need to provide an index canister. Note: not all tokens have index canisters.
import_token.failed_tooltip: The NNS dapp couldn’t load an imported token. Please try again later, or contact the developers.
import_token.maximum_reached_tooltip: You've already imported the maximum number of $max tokens. You need to remove another token before you can import more.
import_token.doc_link_label: How to find ICRC token ledger

portfolio.login_description: Earn rewards, participate in governance and join the communities. Login to gain optimal access of the platform.
